name: Neon City Survivor
description:
Neon city survivor is a time survival game with roguelite elements and minimalist action rpg gameplay.

4 areas to discover


In Neon City Survivor, you must take back the city from the invaders by saving all 4 areas of the city.
Each area has its own mission where hordes of enemies will attack you, so get ready!
Choose a character class and equip the power-ups you need before you go into battle.

Mixing passive and dynamic attacks


All skills in Neon City Survivor have an automatic attack and a manual attack. Use the automatic attacks to fend off enemies and the manual attacks to deal huge tactical blows. Specialise your skills in either the automatic or manual form and discover different ways to play the same skill.

One build, one mission


Start each mission from scratch. Gain experience by killing enemies and learn skills and upgrades to become stronger as you level up.
Adapt to the choices presented to you and create powerful builds around the skills you learn.
Survive, destroy your enemies and complete the tasks given to you to successfully complete your mission.

Uncover the secrets of the city


Each area of the city holds many secrets. Explore them and uncover their secrets to unlock new characters, skills and upgrades.
